value:
The intriguing conversations I have
here are so inspirational... I feel as
if I could compose a beautiful song.

While malicious plots eat silently
away at Hoshido and Nohr, my own
silence consumes me.

The brightness of your smile
seems faded. Please, allow me
to lift your spirits with a song.

Performing is a far more strenuous
task than you might think. You're
welcome to join my daily training.

Sleep was particularly evasive
last night... My preparations may
be more lengthy than usual today.

Greetings, $Nu.
Please receive this gift on behalf
of $Nf.

With the power of this song,
tranquility will be restored to
everyone's troubled hearts.
Today, my voice resonates!

My apologies. It seems my
performance today is lackluster.

You have my gratitude.
My songs will now carry
to even more souls in need.

My name is Azura. Something
about you tells me the power of
my songs may be of use to you.

There's a shadow darkening your
brow, $Nu.
Does something trouble you?$k$pIf you don't wish to speak,
I won't press you. There are silent
secrets nestled in all our hearts...$k$pSuch a secret plagued me
once. I couldn't share my
burden with anyone...$k$pNot even with one as dear to me
as a sibling. But words swallowed
can cause much pain.$k$pIt seems as though you may be
carrying too much. Please...
Speak with me if you trust me.$k$p...Now I'm pressing you, as I
promised I wouldn't. Forgive me,
if you will. I merely want to help.$k$pWhen you can no longer swallow
your secret, come speak with me.
With song, I'll soothe your soul.
えいっ
せいっ
きゃああっ！
だめ…
We walk together.
Care for an encore?
We create the future.
For the world I dreamt of!
It's...all over...
うふふ
We can see this through!
Cheer up, OK?
I'm a Legendary Hero? I see... So that's how I'm known in this world.
If you'd like me to teach you a dance, you need simply ask.
That's where the song ends. It says nothing of the future. Maybe the next part is for someone else to write... Why don't we try?
The path is yours to climb. But I'll help you on your way.
You have to survive. Anything I can do to help you, I will.
I see...
Choose your path.
I'm with you.
